name: Blanca
overview: Blanca Ferrando is a young woman who became blind at the age of twelve, due to a dramatic fire in which her older sister Beatrice died and which was caused by her violent boyfriend, Sebastian. This tragedy made her develop a very strong sense of justice to the point of pushing her to join the police. Blanca is helped by her most trusted friends: her guide dog Linneo, a female bulldog who protects and comforts her in the most difficult moments, and her beautician friend, Stella. After overcoming her work challenges, she finds herself facing sentimental ones: torn between two men, Inspector Michele Liguori, a man of many secrets, and Nanni, a young cook.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After the death of her sister, a woman with blindness joins the police force and solves complicated cases with the help of her exceptional hearing and analytical skills.

episodes.name: Eyeless
episodes.overview: The San Teodoro police station in Genoa is turned upside down by the arrival of Blanca, the new intern with blindness and incredible intuition.

episodes.name: Ghosts
episodes.overview: The body of a boy is found in an ancient noble palace that belongs to the family of Liguori, Blanca's charming colleague.

guest_stars.character: Inspector Michele Liguori as a young boy
guest_stars.name: Giovannino Esposito

guest_stars.character: The old Man in the Cemetery
guest_stars.name: Sergio Tardioli

episodes.name: I dance by myself
episodes.overview: Just when Blanca tries to convince herself that she doesn't care about Liguori, having discovered his relationship with journalist Marinella, her son disappears.

episodes.name: Deep blue
episodes.overview: The police investigate a traffic of Nazi relics that would be headed by Lorenzo, a former drug dealer who now runs the diving center of his girlfriend's family.

episodes.name: Spots
episodes.overview: The disappearance of a young doctoral student in engineering reopens a loose end in Liguori's past and brings to the surface his conflicted relationship with his mother.

guest_stars.character: Inspector Michele Liguori as a young boy
guest_stars.name: Giovannino Esposito

guest_stars.character: Livia Timperi as a young Lady
guest_stars.name: Miriam Cappa

episodes.name: Going back home
episodes.overview: The new case Blanca is investigating interests her closely: it concerns Carmine Russo, the father of the boy she had indicated as her sister's murderer.
